content: Now at the Court of Illumination Shrine, you'll find a pathway straight ahead, and another to the right leading to a large field. The doorway to the right leads to the final boss, so first take a quick detour up the stairs.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Court of Illumination'.
The content is as follows:
Now at the Court of Illumination Shrine, you'll find a pathway straight ahead, and another to the right leading to a large field. The doorway to the right leads to the final boss, so first take a quick detour up the stairs.
